main event: A report of a sighting of a single unidentified object at Kirtland Air Force Base in New Mexico on August 6, 1960.
interesting points: The object was observed for approximately 3 seconds.
The object was described as oscillating in its movement.
No photographs were taken of the object.
The conclusion of the report was that the sighting was of an astronomical nature, likely a meteor.
The observer was a military person who reported the sighting through official channels.
result: The sighting was classified as an 'ASTRO (METEOR)' in the report's conclusion.
sighted object: A single unidentified object in the sky
location: Kirtland Air Force Base, New Mexico
